title: URF should be a gamemode open all the time

embed.description: URF ZED. Disabling shadows doesn't work in Ultra Rapid Fire, so just BAN ZED! ►Lower your ping - WTFast: http://bit.ly/WTFresco Subscribe here ►http://bit.ly/Brofresco Download the BroApp ► http://bit.ly/BROAPP Lootcrate (-10% BROFRESCO) ► http://lootcrate.com/brofresco STALK ME! EXTRA-FRESCO: ● Twitter: https://twitter.com/Brofresco ● Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco ● Facebook: http://www.fb.com/brofrescoyt ● Instagram: http://instagram.com/brofresco

body:
Dear Rito,

I have never gotten a chance to play URF ({{item:3070}} ) and by watching one of brofresco's videos I have always wanted to play it. But since I am away whenever it is on I can't play it so I was thinking if it was open all year people lvl 10 & above could play it whenever they wanted to.

Thankyou for your time {{item:3157}} ,KevvykongGaming.

replies.body: Riot stated that they want every game mode to remain fun and "new" and leaving it open for everyone would take away that, good things come in small packages!{{champion:17}}

as much as i'd like for this to happen, rito have their reasons. it is a shame you can't play it though but it isn't as great as it's cracked up to be and after a couple games of it, it gets quite boring and you'll play normals before long again
why are you watching a brofresco vid that doesnt have anything to do with the pbe?
No. This idea might work on NA but for OCE definitely not.
